abstract: Amazon’s earnings report on Wednesday will be a test of its resiliency, and that of Internet retail in general, as the economy stumbles.
snippet: Amazon’s earnings report on Wednesday will be a test of its resiliency, and that of Internet retail in general, as the economy stumbles.
lead_paragraph: Update: Amazon.com reported a strong quarter but revised its estimated fourth quarter sales downward citing currency changes and uncertainty around consumer spending. Nervous investors have reacted by sending Amazon’s stock down 12 percent in after hours trading.

headline.main: Can Amazon and E-Commerce Survive the Crunch?

abstract: The e-commerce giant posted strong earnings amid a tough economic climate but cut its projected fourth-quarter revenues.
snippet: The e-commerce giant posted strong earnings amid a tough economic climate but cut its projected fourth-quarter revenues.
lead_paragraph: The e-commerce giant Amazon.com posted strong earnings in a tough climate, reporting third-quarter profit on Wednesday that was up 48 percent from the same period last year.

headline.main: Amazon Posts Profit Jump and Offers Fuzzy Forecast
headline.print_headline: Profit Is Up At Amazon, But Outlook Is Reduced
